item.title: Signal Desktop Installation Script
item.description: Signal Desktop Installation Script This script automates the process of installing Signal Desktop on 64-bit Debian-based Linux distributions such as Ubuntu and Mint. Prerequisites A 64-bit Debian-based Linux distribution (e.g., Ubuntu, Mint) Administrative (sudo) privileges Script Overview The script performs the following steps: Installs the official Signal public software signing key. Adds the Signal repository to the system’s list of repositories. Updates the package database and installs Signal Desktop.
